Bounce House.card_desc: [Heroic Leap] Heroic Leap deals 600 damage and applies a Knockback to enemies within 20 units of your landing location.

Bulk Up.card_desc: [Recovery] Using Recovery instantly Heals you for 600 and increases your maximum Health by 300 for 5s.

Bully.card_desc: [Net Shot] Gain {scale=12|12}% Lifesteal against targets Slowed by Net Shot.

Concussion.card_desc: [Net Shot] Reduce the Cooldown of Net Shot by {scale=1|1}s.

Deep Breath.card_desc: [Recovery] Reduce your damage taken by {scale=6|6}% for 2s after using Recovery.

Ensnare.card_desc: [Net Shot] Increase the damage you deal to targets Slowed by Net Shot by 20% and increases the duration of Net Shot's Slow by 0.5s. The damage increase lasts a minimum of 2s.

Exhilarate.card_desc: [Heroic Leap] Hitting at least one champion with Heroic Leap reduces its Cooldown by {scale=1|1}s.

Giga Siphon.card_desc: [Recovery] Increase your movement speed by {scale=10|10} while Recovery is active

Gotcha.card_desc: [Net Shot] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=10|10}% for 3s after using Net Shot.

Leg Day.card_desc: [Heroic Leap] Increase the jump strength of Heroic Leap by {scale=5|5}%.

Momentum.card_desc: [Heroic Leap] Reduce your damage taken by {scale=6|6}% for 4s after using Heroic Leap.

No Escape.card_desc: [Weapon] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=5|5}% for 5s after getting a Killing Blow or Elimination.

Rapid Sustain.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your Healing received by {scale=5|5}% while at or below 50% Health.

Reconstruction.card_desc: [Recovery] Reduce the Cooldown of Recovery by {scale=1|1}s.

Seismic Wave.card_desc: [Heroic Leap] Reduce the Cooldown of Heroic Leap by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Stomping Ground.card_desc: [Weapon] Reduce all active Cooldowns by {scale=15|15}% after getting a Killing Blow.

Tangled.card_desc: [Net Shot] Increase the duration of Net Shot's Slow by {scale=0.3|0.3}s.

Vigor.card_desc: [Recovery] Regenerate 1 Ammo every 0.5s for {scale=0.5|0.5}s after activating Recovery.

Aufgepumpt.card_desc: [Erholung] Erholung heilt sofort 600 LP zusätzlich und deine maximale Gesundheit erhöht sich 5s lang um 300 LP.

Aufheiterung.card_desc: [Heldensatz] Triffst du mindestens einen Champion mit Heldensatz, wird die Abklingzeit der Fertigkeit um {scale=1|1}s reduziert.

Beintag.card_desc: [Heldensatz] Erhöht die Sprungkraft von Heldensatz um {scale=5|5}%.

Durchatmen.card_desc: [Erholung] Nach Verwendung von Erholung wird erlittener Schaden 2s lang um {scale=6|6}% reduziert.

Eingewickelt.card_desc: [Netzschuss] Erhöht die Dauer der Verlangsamung von Netzschuss um {scale=0.3|0.3}s.

Ersch\u00fctterung.card_desc: [Netzschuss] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Netzschuss um {scale=1|1}s.

Erwischt.card_desc: [Netzschuss] Netzschuss erhöht dein Lauftempo 3s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

Gigasauger.card_desc: [Erholung] Erhöht dein Lauftempo während Erholung um {scale=10|10}%.

H\u00fcpfburg.card_desc: [Heldensatz] Heldensatz verursacht 600 Schaden und stößt Gegner im Umkreis von 20 Einheiten um deinen Landepunkt nach oben.

Kein Ausweg.card_desc: [Waffe] Eliminierungen erhöhen dein Lauftempo 5s lang um {scale=5|5}%.

Momentum.card_desc: [Heldensatz] Nach Verwendung von Heldensatz wird erlittener Schaden 4s lang um {scale=6|6}% reduziert.

Schnellerhaltung.card_desc: [Rüstung] Bei 50% oder weniger Gesundheit erhältst du um {scale=5|5}% erhöhte Heilung.

Seismische Welle.card_desc: [Heldensatz] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Heldensatz um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Tummelplatz.card_desc: [Waffe] Todesstöße reduzieren alle aktiven Abklingzeiten um {scale=15|15}%.

Tyrann.card_desc: [Netzschuss] Gewährt {scale=12|12}% Lebensraub gegen durch Netzschuss verlangsamte Ziele.

Verstrickt.card_desc: [Netzschuss] Erhöht die Dauer der Verlangsamung durch Netzschuss um 0,5s und deinen Schaden gegen durch Netzschuss verlangsamte Ziele mindestens 2s lang um 20%.

Vitalit\u00e4t.card_desc: [Erholung] Nach Aktivierung von Erholung wird {scale=0.5|0.5}s lang alle 0,5s 1 Munition erzeugt.

Wiederaufbau.card_desc: [Erholung] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Erholung um {scale=1|1}s.

Athl\u00e9tique.card_desc: [Récupération] Récupération rend instantanément 600 PV, et augmente vos PV max. de 300 pendant 5s.

Balayeur.card_desc: [Arme] Votre vitesse de rechargement augmente de {scale=5|5}%.

Bonds et rebonds.card_desc: [Bond héroïque] Bond héroïque inflige 600 dégâts et repousse les ennemis situés dans un rayon de 20 unités autour de votre zone d'atterrissage.

Commotion.card_desc: [Tir filet] Tir Filet se recharge {scale=1|1}s plus vite.

Euphorie.card_desc: [Bond héroïque] Si Bond héroïque touche un champion, son temps de recharge diminue de {scale=1|1}s.

Filet emm\u00eal\u00e9.card_desc: [Tir filet] Le ralentissement de Tir filet dure 0,5s de plus et vous infligez 20% de dégâts supplémentaires contre sa cible, pendant au minimum 2s.

Foul\u00e9e.card_desc: [Bond héroïque] Le saut de Bond héroïque est {scale=5|5}% plus puissant.

Giga-siphon.card_desc: [Récupération] Votre vitesse augmente de {scale=10|10}% pendant Récupération.

Impulsion.card_desc: [Bond héroïque] Pendant 4s après Bond héroïque, vous subissez {scale=6|6}% de dégâts en moins.

Maille double.card_desc: [Tir filet] Le ralentissement de Tir filet dure {scale=0.3|0.3}s de plus.

Pas d'\u00e9chappatoire.card_desc: [Armure] Chaque élimination augmente votre vitesse de {scale=5|5}% pendant 5s.

Pers\u00e9cution.card_desc: [Tir filet] Vous obtenez {scale=12|12}% de drain de vie contre la cible affectée par Tir filet.

Pi\u00e9tinement.card_desc: [Arme] Chaque exécution réduit les temps de recharge en cours de {scale=15|15}%.

Pris au pi\u00e8ge.card_desc: [Tir filet] Utiliser Tir filet augmente votre vitesse de {scale=10|10}% pendant 3s.

Respiration.card_desc: [Récupération] Pendant 2s après Récupération, vous subissez {scale=6|6}% de dégâts en moins.

Soutien instantan\u00e9.card_desc: [Armure] En dessous de 50% de PV, vous recevez {scale=5|5}% de soins en plus.

Vague sismique.card_desc: [Bond héroïque] Bond héroïque se recharge {scale=0.5|0.5}s plus vite.

Vigueur.card_desc: [Récupération] Activer Récupération redonne 1 munition toutes les 0,5s pendant {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

\u4e0b\u80a2\u5f3a\u5316.card_desc: [英勇跳跃] 增加英勇跳跃的距离{scale=5|5}%

\u518d\u751f\u5f3a\u5316.card_desc: [战斗回复] 除基础效果外还会立即回复600点生命值，且在使用后5秒内最大生命值提高300点

\u529b\u91cf\u5f3a\u5316.card_desc: [捕网射击] 普通攻击命中已被捕网射击减速的目标伤害提高30%

\u52a8\u80fd\u8f6c\u5316.card_desc: [英勇跳跃] 使用英勇跳跃后4秒内，获得{scale=6|6}%伤害减免

\u5730\u9707\u6ce2.card_desc: [英勇跳跃] 降低英勇跳跃的冷却时间{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u5f3a\u529b\u8679\u5438.card_desc: [战斗回复] 回复后4秒内获得{scale=8|8}%的生命偷取效果

\u5feb\u901f\u7eed\u822a.card_desc: [护甲] 生命值低于50%时，你受到的治疗效果将会增加{scale=10|10}%

\u6043\u5f3a\u51cc\u5f31.card_desc: [捕网射击] 攻击捕网射击命中的目标时获得{scale=12|12}%的生命偷取效果

\u6218\u4e89\u8df5\u8e0f.card_desc: [武器] 击败敌人将使你所有技能的冷却时间降低{scale=15|15}%

\u6293\u6355\u9ad8\u624b.card_desc: [捕网射击] 使用捕网射击将使你的移动速度提高{scale=10|10}%，持续3秒

\u632f\u594b.card_desc: [英勇跳跃] 英勇跳跃若命中一个敌人，自身回复{scale=120|120}点生命值

\u65e0\u5904\u53ef\u9003.card_desc: [武器] 击败敌人将使你的移动速度增加{scale=8|8}%，持续8秒

\u6d3b\u529b.card_desc: [战斗恢复] 使用战斗恢复后{scale=0.5|0.5}秒内，每0.5秒获得1发弹药

\u6df1\u547c\u5438.card_desc: [战斗恢复] 回复后3秒内获得{scale=8|8}%的伤害减免

\u6e05\u9053\u592b.card_desc: [武器] 弹药装填速度增加{scale=5|5}%

\u7ec6\u80de\u91cd\u7ec4.card_desc: [战斗回复] 战斗回复的冷却时间减少{scale=1|1}秒

\u7f20\u7ed5.card_desc: [捕网射击] 增加减速的持续时间{scale=0.3|0.3}秒

\u8df3\u8dc3\u5f3a\u5316.card_desc: [英勇跳跃] 英勇跳跃现在会对落点20码范围内的敌人造成600点伤害和击飞效果

\u9707\u8361\u51b2\u51fb.card_desc: [捕网射击] 减少捕网射击的冷却时间{scale=1|1}秒

Bounce House.card_desc: [Heroic Leap] Reduce Heroic Leap's cooldown by 4s.

Breaker.card_desc: [Heroic Leap] Gain CC immunity for {2}s after landing from Heroic Leap

Bully.card_desc: [Weapon] Deal 60% more damage if your current Health percent is higher than that of your target.

Concussion.card_desc: [Heroic Leap] Deal {150} damage to enemies upon landing from Heroic Leap

Dead Zone.card_desc: [Recovery] While Recovery is active, no enemies within {10} units of you receive healing

Giga Siphon.card_desc: [Recovery] Gain +{15}% Lifesteal while Recovery is active

Gotcha.card_desc: [Weapon] Deal 10% bonus damage to targets after hitting them with a net shot.

Leg Day.card_desc: [Heroic Leap] Increase Heroic Leap's distance by {10}%

No Escape.card_desc: [Imprisonment] Deal {10}% more damage for every enemy trapped inside your ultimate

Rapid Sustain.card_desc: [Armor] Receive +{10}% increased healing while below 40% Health.

Reconstruction.card_desc: [Recovery] Upon activation, heal self for {8}% missing Health

Seismic Wave.card_desc: [Heroic Leap] Knock Up all targets for {250} upon landing with Heroic Leap

Tangled.card_desc: [Net Shot] Increase the root duration of net shot by {0.3}s

Tightrope.card_desc: [Armor] Mount at any time, even airborne, and gain {40}% movement speed for 2s upon mounting

Trolling.card_desc: [Net Shot] Net shot roots all additional enemies within {8}ft

Acoso.card_desc: [Disparo de red] Obtienes un {scale=12|12}% de robo de vida contra los objetivos que ralentizas con Disparo de red.

Atrapar.card_desc: [Disparo de red] Aumenta el daño que infliges a los enemigos ralentizados por Disparo de red un 20% y aumenta la duración de la habilidad en 0,5s. El aumento de daño dura 2s como mínimo.

Bien merecido.card_desc: [Disparo de red] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=10|10}% de durante 3s al usar Disparo de red.

Brincol\u00edn.card_desc: [Salto heroico] Salto heroico inflige 600 PS de daño y repele enemigos que estén dentro de una distancia de 20 unidades de donde aterrices.

Cargador veloz.card_desc: [Arma] Tu velocidad de recarga aumenta un {scale=5|5}%.

Contusi\u00f3n.card_desc: [Disparo de red] Se reduce la recarga de Disparo de red en {scale=1|1}s.

El peor d\u00eda.card_desc: [Salto heroico] La potencia del salto de Salto heroico aumenta un {scale=5|5}%.

Entusiasmo.card_desc: [Salto heroico] Si golpeas a al menos un campeón con Salto heroico, su recarga se reduce en {scale=1|1}s.

\u00cdmpetu.card_desc: [Salto heroico] Se reduce el daño recibido en un {scale=6|6}% durante 4s tras usar Salto heroico.

Mara\u00f1a.card_desc: [Disparo de red] La duración de Disparo de red aumenta en {scale=0.3|0.3}s.

Muscular.card_desc: [Recuperación] Recuperación te cura 600 PS instantáneamente y aumenta tu salud máxima en 300 PS durante 5s.

Onda s\u00edsmica.card_desc: [Salto heroico] Se reduce la recarga de Salto heroico en {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Reconstrucci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Recuperación] Se reduce la recarga de Recuperación en {scale=1|1}s.

Respiraci\u00f3n profunda.card_desc: [Recuperación] Se reduce el daño recibido un {scale=6|6}% durante 2s después de usar Recuperación.

Sif\u00f3n Giga.card_desc: [Recuperación] Aumenta tu velocidad de movimiento un {scale=10|10}% mientras dura Recuperación

Sin escapatoria.card_desc: [Arma] Aumentas tu velocidad de movimiento un {scale=5|5}% durante 5s tras asestar un golpe de gracia o conseguir una eliminación.

Suelo pisoteado.card_desc: [Arma] Se reducen todas tus recargas activas un {scale=15|15}% tras asestar un golpe de gracia.

Sustento r\u00e1pido.card_desc: [Armadura] La curación que recibes aumenta un {scale=5|5}% si tienes un 50% o menos de salud.

Vigor.card_desc: [Recuperación] Recuperas 1 de munición cada 0,5s durante {scale=0.5|0.5}s tras activar Recuperación.

Concuss\u00e3o.card_desc: [Disparo de Rede] Reduz o intervalo do Disparo de Rede em {scale=1|1}s.

Emaranhado.card_desc: [Disparo de Rede] Aumenta em {scale=0.3|0.3}s a duração da lentidão causada pelo Disparo de Rede.

Enredado.card_desc: [Disparo de Rede] Aumenta em 20% o dano que você causa nos inimigos desacelerados pelo Disparo de Rede e aumenta a duração da lentidão em 0,5s. O aumento do dano dura no mínimo 2s.

Entusiasmado.card_desc: [Salto Heroico] Reduz o intervalo do Salto Heroico em {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Faxina das Ruas.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta em {scale=5|5}% a velocidade em que carrega a arma.

\u00cdmpeto.card_desc: [Salto Heroico] Reduz em {scale=6|6}% o dano recebido por 4s após usar o Salto Heroico.

Inspira\u00e7\u00e3o Profunda.card_desc: [Recuperação] Reduz o dano recebido em {scale=6|6}% por 2s após usar Recuperação.

Onda S\u00edsmica.card_desc: [Salto Heroico] Atingir ao menos um inimigo com o Salto Heroico reduz seu intervalo em {scale=1|1)s.

P\u00e9 no Ch\u00e3o.card_desc: [Armadura] Reduz em {scale=15|15}% os intervalos ativos após dar o tiro fatal em um inimigo.

Peguei voc\u00ea!.card_desc: [Disparo de Rede] Aumenta a velocidade de movimento em {scale=10|10}% por 3s após usar o Disparo de Rede.

Pula-pula.card_desc: [Salto Heroico] Salto Heroico causa 600 de dano e repele inimigos que estiverem a até 20 unidades de onde você cair.

Reconstru\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Recuperação] Reduz o intervalo da Recuperação em {scale=1|1}s.

Regenera\u00e7\u00e3o R\u00e1pida.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta a cura recebida em {scale=5|5}% enquanto estiver com menos de 50% de vida.

Sem Escapat\u00f3ria.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta sua velocidade de movimento em {scale=5|5}% por 5s após dar o disparo fatal ou conseguir uma eliminação.

Super Sif\u00e3o.card_desc: [Recuperação] Aumenta em {scale=10|10}% a velocidade de movimento enquanto Recuperação estiver ativa

Trabalhando Perna.card_desc: [Salto Heroico] Aumenta a força do Salto Heroico em {scale=5|5}%.

Valent\u00e3o.card_desc: [Disparo de Rede] Ganha {scale=12|12}% de roubo de vida contra alvos desacelerados pelo Disparo de Rede.

Vigor.card_desc: [Recuperação] Gera 1 de munição a cada 0,5s, durante {scale=0.5|0.5}s, após ativar Recuperação.

Vitaminado.card_desc: [Recuperação] Usar Recuperação cura você em 600 instantaneamente e aumenta sua vida máxima em 300 por 5s.

\u0411\u043e\u0434\u0440\u043e\u0441\u04.card_desc: [Терапия] Активация Терапии генерирует 1 боеприпас каждые 0,5 с. в течение {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u0411\u0443\u0433\u0430\u0439.card_desc: [Терапия] Терапия мгновенно исцеляет вас на 600 ед. и увеличивает ваше максимальное здоровье на 300 ед. на 5 с.

\u0411\u044b\u0441\u0442\u0440\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья 50% и ниже вы получаете на {scale=5|5}% больше исцеления.

\u0412\u043e\u043e\u0434\u0443\u0448\u04.card_desc: [Героический скачок] Попадание по чемпиону Героическим скачком сокращает перезарядку способности на {scale=1|1} с.

\u0413\u0438\u0433\u0430\u0441\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Терапия] Во время действия Терапии ваша скорость передвижения повышается на {scale=10|10}%.

\u0413\u043b\u0443\u0431\u043e\u043a\u04.card_desc: [Терапия] После использования Терапии входящий урон снижается на {scale=6|6}% на 2 с.

\u0414\u0440\u043e\u0436\u044c \u0437\u0.card_desc: [Оружие] Текущая перезарядка всех способностей сокращается на {scale=15|15}% после нанесения смертельного удара.

\u0417\u0430\u0434\u0438\u0440\u0430.card_desc: [Выстрел сетью] Вы получаете {scale=12|12}% вампиризма против врагов, замедленных Выстрелом сетью.

\u0418\u043d\u0435\u0440\u0446\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Героический скачок] После использования Героического скачка ваш входящий урон снижается на {scale=6|6}% на 4 с.

\u041d\u0430\u0433\u0440\u0443\u0437\u04.card_desc: [Героический скачок] Сила Героического скачка повышается на {scale=5|5}%.

\u041d\u0430\u0434\u0443\u0432\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Героический скачок] Героический скачок наносит 600 ед. урона и отбрасывает врагов в радиусе 20 ед. от вашей точки приземления.

\u041d\u0435\u0442 \u0432\u044b\u0445\u0.card_desc: [Броня] Смертельные удары и устранения повышают скорость передвижения на {scale=5|5}% на 5 с.

\u041f\u043e\u043f\u0430\u043b\u0441\u04.card_desc: [Выстрел сетью] Использование Выстрела сетью повышает скорость передвижения на {scale=10|10}% на 3 с.

\u041f\u0443\u0442\u044b.card_desc: [Выстрел сетью] Длительность замедления от Выстрела сетью увеличивается на {scale=0.3|0.3} с.

\u0421\u0435\u0439\u0441\u043c\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Героический скачок] Перезарядка Героического скачка сокращается на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u0421\u0438\u043b\u043a\u0438.card_desc: [Выстрел сетью] Урон, который вы наносите целям, замедленным Выстрелом сетью, повышается на 20% на 0,5 с. Эффект длится не менее 2 с.

\u0421\u043e\u0442\u0440\u044f\u0441\u04.card_desc: [Выстрел сетью] Перезарядка Выстрела сетью сокращается на {scale=1|1} с.

Bez wyj\u015bcia.card_desc: [Broń] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=5|5}% na 5 s po zadaniu Zabójczego ciosu lub udanej eliminacji.

B\u0142yskawiczna reakcja.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa otrzymywane leczenie o {scale=5|5}%, jak długo twój poziom zdrowia nie przekracza 50%.

Fala sejsmiczna.card_desc: [Heroiczny wyskok] Skraca czas odnowienia Heroicznego wyskoku o {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Giga syfon.card_desc: [Regeneracja] Zwiększa twoją szybkość ruchu o {scale=10|10} podczas trwania Regeneracji

G\u0142\u0119boki oddech.card_desc: [Regeneracja] Zmniejsza odnoszone obrażenia o {scale=6|6}% na 2 s po użyciu Regeneracji.

Impet.card_desc: [Heroiczny wyskok] Zmniejsza odnoszone obrażenia o {scale=6|6}% przez 4 s po użyciu Heroicznego wyskoku.

Kulturysta.card_desc: [Regeneracja] Regeneracja przywraca ci natychmiast 600 PZ, a twoje maks. zdrowie zwiększa się o 300 PZ na 5 s.

\u0141obuz.card_desc: [Strzał siecią] Zapewnia {scale=12|12}% kradzieży życia przeciw celom spowolnionym Strzałem siecią.

Mam ci\u0119!.card_desc: [Strzał siecią] Strzał siecią zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=10|10}% na 3 s.

Od\u017cycie.card_desc: [Heroiczny wyskok] Trafienie przynajmniej jednego czempiona Heroicznym wyskokiem skraca jego czas odnowienia o {scale=1|1} s.

Praca n\u00f3g.card_desc: [Heroiczny wyskok] Zwiększa zasięg Heroicznego wyskoku o {scale=5|5}%.

Rekonstrukcja.card_desc: [Regeneracja] Skraca czas odnowienia Regeneracji o {scale=1|1} s.

Rewir.card_desc: [Pancerz] Skraca aktywne czasy odnowienia o {scale=15|15}% po zadaniu Zabójczego ciosu.

Trampolina.card_desc: [Heroiczny wyskok] Heroiczny wyskok zadaje teraz 600 obrażeń i odrzuca wrogów w promieniu 20 jedn. od miejsca twojego lądowania.

Usidlenie.card_desc: [Strzał siecią] Zwiększa o 20% obrażenia, jakie zadajesz celom spowolnionym Strzałem siecią i zwiększa czas trwania spowolnienia od Strzału siecią o 0,5 s. Zwiększenie obrażeń trwa min. 2 s.

Wigor.card_desc: [Regeneracja] Aktywacja Regeneracji generuje 1 szt. amunicji co 0,5 s przez {scale=0.5|0.5} s.

Wstrz\u0105s.card_desc: [Strzał siecią] Skraca czas odnowienia Strzału siecią o {scale=1|1} s.

Zapl\u0105tanie.card_desc: [Strzał siecią] Zwiększa czas trwania spowolnienia spowodowanego Strzałem siecią o {scale=0.3|0.3} s.

Bacak Egzersizi.card_desc: [Cesur Atlayış] Cesur Atlayış'ın zıplama gücünü %{scale=5|5} artır.

Co\u015ftur.card_desc: [Cesur Atlayış] Cesur Atlayış ile en az bir Şampiyonu vurmak Bekleme Süresini {scale=1|1}sn azaltır.

Derin Nefes.card_desc: [Toparlanma] Toparlanma kullandıktan sonra aldığın hasarı 2sn boyunca %{scale=6|6} azalt.

Din\u00e7lik.card_desc: [Toparlanma] Toparlanma'yı etkinleştirdikten sonra {scale=0.5|0.5}sn boyunca her 0,5 saniyede 1 Cephane oluştur.

G\u00fc\u00e7len.card_desc: [Toparlanma] Toparlanma seni anında 600 Can iyileştirir ve maksimum Canını 5sn boyunca 300 artırır.

H\u0131zl\u0131 \u0130yile\u015fme.card_desc: [Zırh] %50 Can veya altındayken aldığın İyileştirmeyi %{scale=5|5} artır.

\u0130vme.card_desc: [Cesur Atlayış] Cesur Atlayış kullandıktan sonra 4sn boyunca aldığın hasarı %{scale=6|6} azalt.

Kabaday\u0131.card_desc: [Ağ Atışı] Ağ Atışı ile Yavaşlatılan hedeflere karşı %{scale=12|12} Can Çalma kazan.

Ka\u00e7\u0131\u015f Yok.card_desc: [Silah] Bir Öldürücü Darbe veya Saf Dışı Bırakma yaptıktan sonra Hareket Hızını 5sn boyunca %{scale=5|5} artır.

Kapan.card_desc: [Ağ Atışı] Ağ Atışı ile Yavaşlatılan hedeflere verdiğin hasarı %20 ve Ağ Atışı'nın Yavaşlatmasını 0,5sn artır. Hasar artışı en az 2sn sürer.

Sars\u0131nt\u0131.card_desc: [Ağ Atışı] Ağ Atışı'nın Bekleme Süresini {scale=1|1}sn azalt.

Sismik Dalga.card_desc: [Cesur Atlayış] Cesur Atlayış'ın Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.5|0.5}sn azalt.

U\u011frak Mekan.card_desc: [Silah] Bir Öldürücü Darbe vurduktan sonra tüm aktif Bekleme Sürelerini %{scale=15|15} azalt.

Yakalad\u0131m.card_desc: [Ağ Atışı] Ağ Atışı kullandıktan sonra Hareket Hızını 3sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} artır.

Z\u0131plama Evi.card_desc: [Cesur Atlayış] Cesur Atlayış 600 hasar verir ve iniş konumunun 20 birim yakınında bulunan düşmanları Geri İter.
